scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=development&&npm i && rimraf ReactJSNET/assets && webpack-dev-server --progress --colors --config webpack/config.js
scripts.build-production: set NODE_ENV=production&&npm i && rimraf ReactJSNET/assets && webpack --production --progress --colors --profile --config webpack/config.js
scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=development&&npm i && rimraf ReactJSNET/assets && webpack --progress --colors --profile --config webpack/config.js
scripts.watch: set NODE_ENV=development&&npm i && rimraf ReactJSNET/assets && webpack --progress --colors --profile --watch --config webpack/config.js
